Package org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc

Class ArrowFileReader

java.lang.Object
org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.ArrowReader
org.apache.arrow.vector.ipc.ArrowFileReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, DictionaryProvider
public class ArrowFileReader extends ArrowReader
An implementation of ArrowReader that reads the standard arrow binary file format.
